title: ASUS VivoBook Ultra 14 Core i3 10th Gen - (4 GB/512 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home) X413JA-EK267T||X413JA-EB302T Thin and Light Laptop  (14 inch, Bespoke Black, 1.40 kg)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.Clock Speed: 1.2 GHz with Turbo Boost Upto 3.4 GHz
product_specification.USB Port: 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x USB 3.1 Type A (1st Gen), 1 x USB 3.1 Type C (1st Gen)
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD LED Backlit Anti-glare IPS Display (250 nits Brightness, 45% NTSC Color Gamut, 16:9 Aspect Ratio)

product_description.Work, Play, and More: The ASUS VivoBook Ultra 14 is a stunning and powerful personal laptop with multiple attractive features, including the color-blocking Enter key. Powered by an Intel processor, this device lets you do various everyday tasks with ease.
product_description.Color-blocking Enter Key: This design feature ensures that the Enter key is highlighted and easily visible.
product_description.NanoEdge Display: The VivoBook Ultra 14 features a NanoEdge display that offers a big screen on a small frame. Hence, you get uninterrupted, immersive visuals without distractions. Also, the Full HD display along with wide-viewing angles and impressive colour reproduction delivers vivid and lifelike visuals.
product_description.Light and Portable: With a weight of about 1.4 kg and a thin profile, this laptop is easy to carry along.
product_description.High Productivity: Powered by an Intel processor, high RAM capacity, and PCIe SSD memory, this ASUS laptop helps boost your productivity.
product_description.ASUS Intelligent Performance Technology: The AIPT is a thermal design as well as a power-saving solution that ensures that this device delivers energy-efficient performance. By using exclusive ASUS algorithms, about five to nine smart sensors, and an aerodynamic IceBlade fan design, this technology intelligently improves the CPU performance while maintaining stability, long battery life, and quiet operation.

After one month of use ASUS VIVOBOOK 14/15 i3 core laptop value of money and good performance.
In this laptop there is baklit keyboard, which gives good typing experience in night and a finger prit reader for the security.
There is 14" antiglare display and tracked is also good and fast.
This LAPTOP is good for daily work and also for student..
Number of ports:-
1 HDMI
1 Charging port
1 USB type C
3.5mm earphone jack
1 memory card reader
3 USB type A

Camera quality of this laptop is very bad. It is like 1990's camera with lot of bubbles. Even the a 5K mobile will have better camera. If you are planning to use this for video calls as a presenter, then this is not the choice.

Also the customer support is very bad, not able to connect with them through call or chat properly.

Apart from this all other features are good

My Lappy....
DREAM COMES TRUE

Its light, looks sleek, display is awesome (it gives you those matte screen vibes) and performance depends on your usage. If you are a student, perform basic coding and need a laptop for your school/college assignments (ppt, doc etc.) under 40k which comes with a BACKLIT keyboard!! Just go for it!!

Now coming to your main concern, is 4gb ram enough?
1st, yes! It is enough, if you are not editing videos or playing games ( it's not a gaming laptop tbh)
2nd, you can increase the ram upto 12 gb. Yup!! It comes with a second slot. So, if you feel like you need to increase the ram, buy one (2,4,8 according to your need).

Now, about the battery backup. It's about 3-4 hrs if you are performing a lot of tasks. Kinda disappointing┐(￣ヘ￣)┌
But it's fine if we look at the price we are getting it.
Other two cons:
No MS office ( they have already mentioned)
Slows down if you install skin (〒﹏〒)

Best Laptop in 35k.. Looks premium and attractive.

Pros:-
(1) It comes with 14 inch Anti Glare Ips screen... Which u can not found in any laptop in this price segment.
(2) premium design, Good build Quality.
(3) Best combination of Windows 10th gen with 512gb makes working super smooth.
(4) Hermon Cardon spekars are not so much loud but pleasent to hear...

Cons:- Battery... It has almost 4 hrs battry backup with medium brightness level.
Build Quality:- Build quality can be more better as compare to HP Brand laptops.
Rest is fine... A Good deal in 35k.

First I was very confused which laptop I have to purchase. As I am master's student so I have to do a lot of assignments and presentations. I was searching a laptop which is good enough for all the parameters light weight, fast, good design, decent memory. As I am not a heavy user. For my type of persons it will be best & it is unbeatable. Because 1TB HDD can not beat 512 GB SSD & SSD is very fast as compared to HDD. Laptop boots in just 7-8 Seconds. Best feature is fingerprint sensor. It is best in its class no company is offering it under 40K. Secondly it have backlight display which appears very beautiful while working in night. Other features includes its weight that is very very light. Hardly equal to a medium size book.
I will give you premium and decent look when you will saw it to anyone. Although battery is average but not a hurdle. I think it is best laptop for study. You will find everything good in it. It somewhat gives you feeling of MacBook. You will lack MS office which you can easily get online or anywhere else. One also very good feature it have its speakers i.e. Harmon kardon which is parent company of JBL & it have inbuilt antiglare night display which will be good for everyone.

Best laptop for students and working professionals. Finger print sensor is just awesome. Decent battery life. If you are looking for a laptop for regular office works or if you are a student, then you can go for it. But, I've not played heavy games yet.

Good product by Flipkart and it work so fast and smooth.

Overall it was a awesome product by Asus.

People demotivate you for buying an Asus. so why did I get one?
Answer is simple, Personal experience.
I am using ROG Since past 2 years,
I got its main board blown due to moisture in just 2 months. (due to my mistake, I kept it packed in its box in the cupboard after usage. NEVER DO THIS.)
I just contacted Asus Support, I got my board replaced hassle free.
Option to Avail service onsite or carry in.
(My experience applies to Pune's service center, Data care corp. in deccan )

Note: If you requirements are slightly moderate to heavy, then you should not go for systems with i3, or else you will end up complaining.

*Product quality:*

Booting Process: Very fast
Battery: 5-6 hours constant working without charging
Display: Good
Sound: Not loud but clear and sweet to listen.
Backlit Keyboard: Unbelievable at this price.
Touch pad: Smooth
Heating issue: NO
Camera: Sufficient at this price.
Ports: Mainly now a days we all work through USB PORTS. It comes with two USB ports, which is sufficient.
Storage: It comes with 500GB SSD, in which approx 400GB can be use as personal storage. Rest storage will use for Application software and OS.
Operating System: PRE INSTALLED Windows 10 Home Single Language.
MS OFFICE: NOT PRE INSTALLED. Original version is highly recommended to purchase.
Antivirus: NOT PRE INSTALLED. I am using MCAFEE purchased version. Running good.
Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-1005G1 CPU @ 1.20GHz 1.19 GHz
Installed RAM: 4.00 GB (3.70 GB usable)
Weight: Light weight
Design & body color: Decent and cool.

Rating: 4.6 OUT OF 5

*Product performance on official works:*

For official work purpose (excluding video editing or any photo editing / media editing) the performance is outstanding.
If you work on MS OFFICE, EMAILS, WEB SURFING, Media Player, Messaging application at a same time then also it will provide a excellent performance with Zero percent hanging issue.

Rating: 5 OUT OF 5

I got this machine at an offer price of 34k during Big Billion Days. I received it on 08th Nov'20 and I am giving my comprehensive review after a full day of extensive usage. In short, this is a superb laptop at such low price and students/professionals can definitely buy this if they don't require heavy memory/graphic usage.

Coming to the detailed review now:

USP: This laptop is a steal deal at 34k due to the 512GB SSD available, which runs super smooth.

Pros:
1. Design: The look and finish of this laptop are immensely attractive. You may go for the blue colour variant as it looks amazing.
2. Weight: The laptop feels really light and easy to handle
3. Speed: The SSD really gives a big push to the performance as this system boots up and shuts down really fast. The average time for starting-up being 8-9 seconds and for shut-down, it's just 2 seconds.
4. Touchpad and finger-sensor: Both of these work like a charm
5. Keyboard: The board feels really smooth and the backlight option is like a cherry on the cake
6. Battery: While continuously streaming videos, the battery drained completely in 5 hours, which is pretty decent. Do not expect a longer backup than this while heavy usage

Cons:
1. Display: The display is not very vibrant but at such a price, the display offered seems quite good
2. Sound: I had honestly bought this laptop with no expectations with sound (as per the older reviews), but the sound is actually not that bad. The volume is definitely lower than my old Lenovo laptop, but it is still pretty decent in itself. There no Harman/Kardon software provided though, to control the sound quality.
3. Camera: The camera is pretty decent during the daytime, but it gets a lot of grains during the night. It could definitely have been better.
4. MS Office: This comes just for a free one-month trial
5. RAM slot: The RAM is soldered onto the motherboard and with the absence of additional slots, one cannot increase the memory in future

Overall, this laptop is a superb machine at this price with various top features. If you're not expecting a very high-end gaming performance from this machine, you may blindly go for it.
